details: I have actively contributed to the development of the Exchange program, a prominent feature introduced by Amazon in India. This innovative program enables retail customers to exchange their old devices for new ones, while enjoying a discounted price on the new device.

I had the privilege of working on the XXL project, a large-scale endeavour that encompassed a wide range of services within Amazon. Throughout the project, I actively contributed to the development of various services, both customer-facing and partner-facing services for Amazon customers and partners.
The core work was Java back-end development, with AWS as cloud service.

I have successfully improved a trading raw data processor by incorporating new functionalities. Additionally, I developed a Java Spring Boot-based mock API to rigorously test a highly sensitive feature.
I was responsible for managing AWS resources. I improved the infrastructure and solved problems that the company was struggling to solve for years.
I worked with minimal help from other teammates even through I was a fresh graduate.
